platform.title: CLOUD GAMING PLATFORM
platform.device:
Run PC games
on any device

power.title: Power up your devices
power.first_content: Games launch on our high-end remote gaming rigs, gameplay is streamed to you. Enjoy hundreds of titles from popular platforms.
power.launch: * Launch the games you already own
power.two_content: No downloads, storage and updates of game files. Your job is to game, we take care of the rest.
power.three_content: Instant access to games and unlimited gaming sessions. Play as long as you want!

gaming.title: Plenty of cool stuff
gaming.two_content:
Start playing on one device,
continue on another

unlimited.title: Unlimited AAA gaming
unlimited.first_note: Run PC games on low-end, outdated or ultra portable devices!
unlimited.two_note: Play on Mac, Linux, iOS, Android, ChromeOS or smart TVs without console
unlimited.tab1_pick: Pick a game, log into game account and play!
unlimited.tab2_text: Enjoy our apps for Windows PC, Mac, and Linux (Ubuntu, Mint, Debian, Fedora). Run hundreds of PC games on any device close at hand!
unlimited.tab3_text: Enjoy PC games on TV without a console. Grab a gamepad and play on a big screen!
unlimited.tab3_look: Look for Boosteroid App in your Samsung and LG application stores
unlimited.tab4_text: PC games on a smartphone? Why not! Play wherever you are no matter if you don’t have a computer around.

anydevice.title: Now any device is a top gaming station

plan.title: Choose your plan!
plan.subtitle: Subscribe and enjoy
plan.payment: Visa, Mastercard, American Express, Google Pay, Apple Pay, Paysafecard and many more payment options available.
plan.log: Sign up or log in to learn more
plan.core_one: Access to the whole game catalog
plan.core_four: Access to games on all compatible devices (PC, Mac, laptop, tablet, phone or TV)
plan.core_five: Compatible with many popular gamepads (Xbox series X, S, Xbox One, PS4, etc.)
plan.core_six: Everything is secure, we don’t share your data with anyone

begin.title:
Let the Journey
begin!
begin.li_three: Play in browser and on any devices
